description: Katt shows up as a very modest and quiet girl. She doesn’t brag about how tough she is, nor does she try to prove that she is capable of handling extensive torment. It seems that she has such little experience that this may be a mild day. We get her tied up, start the torment, and that’s when we find out what kind of pain slut we’re dealing with. Katt craves to be helpless and not have control. She needs the suffering to feel complete.
title: First timer gets a lesson in suffering and bondage.
